sn42.13:3.5: ca vahātuṃ → tāni ca pahātuṃ (sya-all, km); tāni vahātuṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); tāni ca yātuṃ (katthaci); tāni cāvahātuṃ (?)
sn42.13:9.5: pasayha ratanaṃ ahāsi → pasayha adinnaṃ ādiyati (sya-all); pasayha adinnaṃ ratanaṃ ādiyi (mr)
sn42.13:23.5: yvāhaṃ → yohaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kiñci → kañci (?)
sn42.13:23.6: Ubhayamettha → ubhayattha me (?) | upapajjissāmī’ti → upapajjīssāmīti (pts-vp-pli1ed); paraṃ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
sn42.13:25.10: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmī’ti → paraṃ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
